name: YouBeats
tag_list: hip-hop, music-social-network, music-hosting, music-charts, indie-music, underground-music, rap
overview:
YouBeats.com is a hip hop music community that gives artists the opportunity to gain prime exposure through multiple rankings systems. Artists are ranked in charts based on the personal feedback of radio DJs, such as DJ Wonder of Sirius Radio and Hot 97. YouBeats also has automatically updating category charts, which ranks a song based on the number of times a track is played. YouBeats also offers customizable personal pages, free unlimited music hosting, and a discussion forum.

Listeners have access to free streaming and downloadable hip hop music, organized by genre, in addition to a customizable playlist.
